message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my product, which I know you've been interested in. I believe it holds significant value for your business, potentially exceeding $1,200,000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,000,000, a price that ensures a profitable return for both of us.  This is a one-time offer, as I have another buyer ready to purchase it for $800,000. Let me know your decision.
